sections.heading: officers; suspension pending trial; vacancy; how filled
sections.text: When the accused is an officer of the court, and is suspended, the court may supply his place by appointment for the term.SourceR.S.1866, c. 45, § 9, p. 298;R.S.1913, § 5706;C.S.1922, § 5036;C.S.1929, § 26-1709;R.S.1943, § 23-2009.Annotations"S
